user.title: First time setting
user.description:
Welcome to this integrated plug-in!
Exclusively written and produced by [@knoop7](https://github.com/knoop7)

All types of commercial use and secondary modification related derivatives are strictly prohibited
If there is any violation, the update will be stopped and the subsequent maintenance of the code will be stopped.


**Traditional calendar: **
• Display traditional Yin-Yang Gregorian information in real time
• Accurate forecast of twenty-four solar terms
• Daily good and bad luck, good and taboo guidance
• Custom editing holidays

**Birthday Management: **
• Family members’ birthdays
• Related Eight Characters and Birthday Reminder Functions

**Incident Management: **
• Investment and financial management reminder
• Work arrangement reminder
• Reminder for meetings and dinners
• Anniversary reminder

data.setup_options: Select the features that need to be enabled:

birthday.title: Birthday management configuration

init.description: Select the functional area to manage

delete_birthday.title: Delete birthday information
delete_birthday.description: Are you sure to delete the birthday information?

birthday_ai_edit.title: AI birthday fortune configuration
birthday_ai_edit.description:
Free charity interface: [Click to get the key](https://api.chatanywhere.tech/v1/oauth/free/render)

The free version supports gpt-5, gpt-4o, gpt-4.1 5 times a day; supports deepseek-r1, deepseek-v3.1 30 times a day, and supports gpt-4o-mini, gpt-3.5-turbo, gpt-4.1-mini, gpt-4.1-nano, gpt-5-mini, gpt-5-nano 200 times a day.

It is recommended to use the deepseek-r1 model, which is the best effect for AI fortune-telling prediction.

data.name: Event name
data.auto_remove: Automatically delete events (automatically delete sensors after one day)

data.name: Event name
data.auto_remove: Automatically delete events (automatically delete sensors after one day)

edit_event_time.title: Set time
edit_event_time.description: Set a specific countdown time for event {name}

delete_event.title: Delete event information
delete_event.description: Are you sure to delete the event information?

edit_holidays.title: Holiday configuration
edit_holidays.description:
**User tutorial description: **
The configuration file uses YAML format, supports setting **customdays** (custom holidays) **holidays** (holidays) **workdays** (working days). Each date format is **YYY-MM-DD**, and comments can be used. Note: prevent other special symbols from entering the normal integration operation.
